forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 72. West southwest wind 7 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As dusk envelops Downtown San Francisco, a gentle clarity descends upon the city. The forecast whispers of a mostly clear night, with temperatures settling around a mild 57 degrees. The west-southwest breezes, soft yet persistent, hint at the arrival of a pleasant evening. The horizon remains unbroken, a testament to the city's characteristic resilience against the encroaching marine layer. While a faint veil of fog may be seen clinging to the periphery, the heart of the city stands vibrant and inviting against the slate-colored sky.

Tomorrow promises warmth and sunshine, coaxing the city to life with a near-72 degree embrace. The winds will playfully gust, providing a lively backdrop to a day promising outdoor adventures. In such delightful weather, opting for layers becomes essential—perhaps a light sweater for the morning chill, giving way to a simple t-shirt by midday. With the comfort of a café patio in mind or a leisurely stroll along waterfront paths, one can savor this day. It beckons exploration, whether wandering through tucked-away shops or enjoying the simple pleasure of an open-air lunch at one of the city’s many hidden gems.
